entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot create a new Blazor(Razor Component) inside a sub folder. ( this works in .NET 8) #54726
  • SignalR tolerance for packet loss #54725
  • Blazor streaming rendering without JavaScript #54724
  • UsePathBase not working for Blazor Web App NET8 with individual accounts interactivity mode server #54723
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #54721
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #54720
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #54719
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #54718
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #54717
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #54716
  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54712

Closed

  • Route Params are not able to validate Guid[] parameters #54602
  • Blazor DynamicComponent is reusing old instances and their states #54727
  • WebSockets.AcceptWebSocketAsync disables custom exception handler #54671
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, multiple_queries #54661

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection
  • Set correct ProductVersion for productVersion.txt #54710
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Point Node-Externals submodule to a commit that exists #54715
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Update MSDN URL in OAuthHandler #54691
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24165.20 #54588
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54707
    area-dataprotection
  • Limit parallelism of forced key ring refreshes #54627
    area-dataprotection
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking
